backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend with state variables for user profiles, transactions, expenses, budgets, goals, AI predictions, blog posts, chat sessions, quiz data, and subscriptions. Includes type definitions for financial entities and integrates AccessControl and Storage modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including Google AdSense integration, AI Insights Hub, Advanced AI Budget System, and various financial management capabilities with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend React components and pages including Dashboard, Analytics, Transactions, AIInsights, Settings, and various public pages with implementation details about localStorage persistence, routing, and UI functionality.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable template defining VITE_APP_VERSION=242 and optional build metadata fields for deployment tracking.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with Google AdSense script (pub-5050836253831761), Google Analytics, comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter cards, structured data for organization/website, and multiple favicon references.
frontend/netlify.toml: Netlify configuration defining build settings, ads.txt serving rules with highest priority, SPA routing redirects, security headers, and cache control policies for static assets.
frontend/public/_headers: HTTP headers configuration for ads.txt specifying text/plain content type, 1-hour cache, and noindex robots directive.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify redirect rules ensuring ads.txt is served directly with 200 status and SPA fallback to index.html for all other routes.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Google AdSense ads.txt file declaring publisher ID pub-5050836253831761 as DIRECT with reseller ID f08c47fec0942fa0.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon featuring a blue circle background with gold dollar/rupee symbol, green growth arrow overlay, and accent dots for modern finance branding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with React Query provider, TanStack Router setup for 20+ public and 12 private routes, Internet Identity authentication, theme provider, and profile setup dialog for new users.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Access denied page component that prompts unauthenticated users to log in with Internet Identity or navigate back to home.
frontend/src/components/AIChatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with expandable UI that processes user messages, displays conversation history with visual insights (charts, balance cards), and provides financial advice with disclaimers and follow-up suggestions.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsGuard.t: Guard component that checks user preferences and blocks access to analytics page if analyticsVisible is disabled, showing a message with navigation options to settings or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main application layout component that handles authentication, navigation menu (desktop and mobile), user profile display, logout functionality, and renders page content based on current route with analytics visibility filtering.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionBadg: Simple badge component that displays the application build version from buildInfo.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Cookie consent banner component that appears for unauthenticated users, stores consent in localStorage with expiry, and provides links to cookie and privacy policies.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer with brand info, social media links, and organized navigation sections (quick links, resources, trust/security, learning) plus build version badge.
frontend/src/components/GoalDeleteConfir: Confirmation dialog component for deleting financial goals with warning icon, description, and cancel/confirm actions with loading state.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header component with responsive desktop/mobile menus, authentication state handling, and navigation to public pages (Home, Features, About, etc.) and dashboard/login based on user authentication status.
frontend/src/content/defaultBlogPosts.ts: Exports default blog post data with two entries covering monthly budgeting and emergency fund topics, including metadata like featured images, slugs, and SEO tags.
frontend/src/content/defaultQuizQuestion: Exports an array of financial literacy quiz questions covering topics like budgeting (50/30/20 rule, zero-based budgeting, envelope method), net worth, and financial goals with explanations and real-life tips.
frontend/src/content/staticProblemSoluti: Defines 15 static problem-solution blog entries addressing common financial challenges like living paycheck-to-paycheck, emergency funds, credit card debt, and retirement planning with practical solutions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendVersion.ts: React Query hook that fetches the backend version string from the actor with infinite stale time since version doesn't change during runtime.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Custom hook providing currency conversion and formatting utilities supporting USD, INR, and EUR with exchange rates, symbols, and locale-specific number formatting based on user preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useDefaultContentInit: Mutation hook that simulates default content initialization with a mock delay, invalidating blog and quiz queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for idle handling and derivation origin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations, including mock blog posts data and integration with Internet Identity authentication and deterministic assistant response generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration, defining a purple-violet-blue gradient theme with light/dark mode support, custom scrollbar styling, and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/lib/blog/blogContentCache.t: Manages localStorage caching for generated blog content with 7-day expiration, providing functions to load, save, and clear cached blog articles.
frontend/src/lib/blog/generateAdsenseArt: Generates comprehensive 800+ word blog articles from metadata, with hardcoded content for personal finance topics including budgeting, investing, and financial fundamentals.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/budgetLo: Core budget planning logic that calculates budget allocations using rules like 50/30/20 or 60/20/20, generates expense breakdowns, and computes savings progress and cash flow from user inputs.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/healthSc: Calculates a financial health score (0-100) based on savings rate, cash flow, emergency fund, debt management, and financial planning factors, with explanations and advice.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/progress: Calculates form completion progress as a weighted percentage (70% required fields, 30% optional fields) for the budget planner input form.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/projecti: Generates 12-month savings projection data showing monthly and cumulative savings based on budget plan allocations.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/recommen: Generates personalized financial recommendations (saving strategies, investing guidance, financial improvement tips) based on user inputs, budget plan, savings rate, debt status, emergency fund, and financial knowledge level.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/reminder: Generates ICS calendar files for budget action step reminders, scheduling events 7 days in the future with 15-minute advance alarms.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build metadata including version, timestamp, git SHA, and environment flags; defines target version '242' with helper to check version match.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides currency conversion utilities between USD, INR, and EUR with exchange rates, formatting functions, and currency symbol/name getters.
Implements a deterministic AI assistant that classifies finance queries (stocks, investing, budgeting, saving, expenses) and generates structured responses without external API calls, using user context data.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalCoachSuggesti: Generates expense optimization suggestions based on top spending categories and provides static income boost ideas for goal achievement.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalPlanning.ts: Computes savings goal planning metrics including remaining amount, progress percentage, required monthly/daily savings, feasibility assessment, and warning messages based on income.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalSimulation.ts: Generates three timeline simulation scenarios (current, longer +50%, shorter -33%) for savings goals with feasibility assessments based on monthly income.
frontend/src/lib/goals/goalTracking.ts: Computes goal tracking status by comparing actual progress against expected time-based progress, calculating a performance score (0-100) with bonuses for being ahead of schedule.
frontend/src/lib/quizProgressStorage.ts: Manages per-user quiz progress persistence in localStorage, tracking asked questions, completion status, correct/incorrect answers, with functions to load, save, clear, and update progress.
frontend/src/lib/serialization.ts: Provides utilities for converting between Motoko (BigInt, nanosecond timestamps) and JavaScript types, including recursive BigInt-to-number conversion to prevent serialization errors and specialized serializers/deserializers for transactions, savings goals, and user profiles.
frontend/src/lib/transactions/monthlyAgg: Computes current-month financial aggregates (income, expenses, available savings, category totals) from transaction data and provides a helper to retrieve top N expense categories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider context, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Marketing/informational page describing FinanceWise AI's mission, vision, values, community, innovation, security, and transparency with icon-based feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx: Displays AI-powered financial insights including spending by category (pie chart), monthly income/expense trends (line chart), savings rate, goal progress, and ML model descriptions (Linear Regression, GRU, LSTM).
frontend/src/pages/AIInsightsHub.tsx: Interactive chat interface for a deterministic financial assistant that answers user questions about budgeting, saving, investing, and expenses using context from transactions, goals, and preferences.
frontend/src/pages/AITransparency.tsx: Informational page explaining how the app's three AI models (Linear Regression, GRU, LSTM) work, what they can and cannot do, and the app's commitment to transparency and user control.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Main analytics dashboard displaying financial transactions, charts (spending trends, category breakdowns, pie charts), and forms to add income/expense transactions with category, payment type, and date fields.
frontend/src/pages/Benefits.tsx: Marketing page showcasing six key benefits of the FinanceWise AI app (financial health, privacy, time-saving, stress reduction, goal achievement, and free access) in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdmin.tsx: Admin page for initializing default blog content (15 finance blog posts and 100 quiz questions) with a single initialization button and status display.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPost.tsx: Individual blog post display page that fetches a post by slug, renders it with hero section, featured image, tags, publication date, and generates AdSense-optimized article content.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanner.tsx: Budget planning tool with user mode selection (student/professional), income/expense input fields, smart allocation recommendations, overspending alerts, and emergency fund calculations with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/CAFeatures.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Calculators.tsx: Financial calculators page with tabs for SIP, Lumpsum, FIRE (Financial Independence Retire Early), and Tax calculators, each with input fields and result displays using currency formatting.
frontend/src/pages/Challenges.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Compare.tsx: Renders a comparison page showing FinanceWise AI features versus competitors in a table format with checkmarks and X marks. Displays 10 feature rows including AI insights, security, educational content, and blockchain storage.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a form for submitting messages (name, email, message) and displays contact information cards (email, response time, support hours). Uses useSubmitContactForm hook to handle form submissions.
frontend/src/pages/CookiePolicy.tsx: Static informational page explaining cookie usage, including essential, analytics, and advertising cookies (Google Analytics and AdSense). Displays cookie types, purposes, and management instructions in card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerCare.tsx: Customer support page combining a contact form, support information cards (email, hours, live chat), and an FAQ accordion section. Similar to Contact.tsx but includes additional support resources.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying financial overview with transactions, savings goals, balance, and analytics charts (bar, pie, line). Includes transaction entry dialog with category/payment type selection and time period filtering (daily/weekly/monthly).
frontend/src/pages/DeploymentInfo.tsx: Admin page showing version information comparing frontend and backend versions against target version. Displays version sync status with alerts and badges, requires authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Disclaimer.tsx: Displays a comprehensive disclaimer page with warnings that FinanceWise AI is for educational purposes only and does not provide financial, investment, tax, or legal advice.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Renders an FAQ page with an accordion of 10 common questions about FinanceWise AI covering topics like security, pricing, AI accuracy, and data export.
frontend/src/pages/Features.tsx: Displays a features showcase page with 8 feature cards highlighting AI insights, analytics, goal tracking, security, calculators, educational content, expense tracking, and investment portfolio management.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceBlog.tsx: Renders a blog listing page with a hero section and grid of blog post cards fetched via useGetAllBlogPosts hook, with loading states and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialWellness.tsx: Displays a financial wellness page with 6 cards covering emotional comfort, financial psychology, security, peace of mind, growth mindset, and community support aspects.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Comprehensive savings goals management page with CRUD operations, progress tracking, goal planning metrics, expense optimization suggestions, income boost ideas, and simulation scenarios using multiple custom hooks and utility functions.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page component displaying hero section, feature cards (AI insights, analytics, security, goals, calculators, education), statistics, and call-to-action buttons for login/signup.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: Informational page explaining the six-step process of using FinanceWise AI, from account creation through Internet Identity to achieving financial success with AI guidance.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentCalculators: Empty file placeholder for investment calculator tools page.
frontend/src/pages/Investments.tsx: Empty file placeholder for investments management page.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for user leaderboard/rankings page.
frontend/src/pages/LearnFinance.tsx: Empty file placeholder for financial education content page.
frontend/src/pages/Learning.tsx: Quiz dashboard showing user statistics, progress tracking, topic categories (budgeting, saving, investing, etc.), and achievements for 100 educational questions.
frontend/src/pages/LearningStockMarket.t: Empty file placeholder for stock market learning content page.
frontend/src/pages/Legal.tsx: Empty file placeholder for legal information page.
frontend/src/pages/LegalHub.tsx: Empty file placeholder for centralized legal documents hub page.
frontend/src/pages/LoansEMI.tsx: Empty file placeholder for loans and EMI calculator page.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Authentication page with Internet Identity login integration, featuring branding, feature highlights, and automatic redirect to dashboard upon successful login.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyPsychology.tsx: Financial psychology assessment page with 8-question quiz to determine user's money personality type, risk tolerance, and provide personalized recommendations based on scoring.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Privacy policy page displaying terms about data collection, usage, sharing, security, retention, and user consent in a formatted card layout.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Displays a comprehensive privacy policy page with sections on information collection, usage, data security, user rights, and contact information using card-based layout with icons.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Public landing page component with hero section, three feature cards (AI Insights, Real-Time Analytics, Secure & Private), and a call-to-action section with navigation to login and features pages.
frontend/src/pages/Quiz.tsx: Interactive financial literacy quiz component that displays questions from defaultQuizQuestions, tracks score and progress, shows feedback with explanations, and requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Resource hub page displaying six categories of financial resources (guides, videos, calculators, learning paths, templates, blog) with navigation to relevant sections.
frontend/src/pages/Roadmap.tsx: Product roadmap page showing completed v1.0 features and upcoming planned features with status badges, ETAs, and categorization by development stage.
frontend/src/pages/Security.tsx: Public-facing security page showcasing six security features (encryption, blockchain storage, Internet Identity, zero-knowledge architecture, no third-party access, GDPR compliance) in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityPrivacy.tsx: Authenticated user security dashboard with security status indicators, privacy control toggles (stealth mode, biometrics, data sharing, analytics), and connected devices list requiring Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page component that allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile information, preferences (theme, notifications, analytics visibility, currency), and manage their Internet Identity account with save/logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Terms and Conditions page displaying legal terms including agreement, accounts, intellectual property, liability disclaimers, and governing law with a hero section and formatted content card.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Alternative Terms and Conditions page with Header/Footer layout, displaying permitted uses, account requirements, and prohibited activities in structured cards with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Transactions.tsx: Transaction history page that displays, searches, filters, edits, and deletes user transactions with a table view, search functionality, and edit dialog for updating transaction details.
frontend/src/pages/Updates.tsx: Updates and Roadmap page showcasing version history with features (v2.0.0 with 100 quiz questions, v1.5.0 security enhancements, v1.0.0 launch) and future planned features like mobile app, bank integration, and advanced AI models.
frontend/src/pages/UseCases.tsx: Use Cases page displaying six user personas (students, professionals, homeowners, families, travelers, investors) with relevant financial scenarios and features tailored to each group.
frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no: Requirement document specifying that the existing finance quiz system must remain unchanged with no new quiz questions, bulk additions, or modifications to quiz-related files.
frontend/src/types/backend-types.ts: TypeScript type definitions mirroring backend Motoko types including UserPreferences, TransactionData, SavingsGoal, AIPrediction, BlogPost, QuizQuestion, QuizProgress, ChatMessage, and related enums.
frontend/src/types/budget-planner.ts: TypeScript interfaces for budget planner functionality including BudgetInputs with income/expense fields and BudgetPlan with summary, allocation, breakdown, and savings progress structures.
frontend/src/types/local-types.ts: Re-exports commonly used types from backend-types.ts for convenience including QuizQuestion, Currency, SavingsGoal, TransactionData, and BlogPost.
frontend/src/types/transaction.ts: Local Transaction type definition with fields for id, amount, category, notes, date, paymentType, user Principal, createdAt, and transactionType.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and parameter cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar colors, chart colors, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vercel.json: Vercel deployment configuration specifying build commands, environment variables for backend canister and IC host, SPA rewrites, and security headers including CSP and frame options.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a financial management app with unified Motoko backend, AI-powered budgeting, insights hub, AdSense integration, and listing 10+ existing features with their requirement IDs.
unknown.txt: Performance optimization documentation showing expected improvements (60-80% faster load times, rendering, and queries) and implementation roadmap. Includes monitoring setup, load testing recommendations, and success metrics (TTI <2s, FCP <1s, LCP <2.5s).
